  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, c4, c3)), wral(s0, c5, wral(s1, co(cv(s0), c4, c1), wral(s2, co(cv(s0), c4, c1), wi(wceq(co(c0, co(cop(cv(s0), c1), c6, c3), cv(s1)), co(c0, co(cop(cv(s0), c1), c6, c3), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))))), diffsc(s2, c5))

blocks.name: monpropd
blocks.content: If two categories have the same set of objects, morphisms, and compositions, then they have the same monomorphisms. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)

thm oppcmon(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c3, c0)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(coppc, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, ccat))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmon, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cepi, c5))
} = {
  syl6req(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c3, c0), co(c2, ctpos(c1), c0), w0)
  oveqd(c2, c3, c0, ctpos(c1), w0)
  syl5eq(c3, ctpos(c1), cfv(cepi, c5), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cepi, c5), ctpos(c1)), wcel(c5, ccat))
  fvmpt(hs0, c5, ccat, cepi, ctpos(c1), ctpos(cfv(cmon, cfv(coppc, cv(hs0)))))
  tposeqd(cfv(cmon, cfv(coppc, cv(hs0))), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmon, cfv(coppc, cv(hs0))), c1, cfv(cmon, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  fveq2d(cmon, cfv(coppc, cv(hs0)), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  syl6eqr(cfv(coppc, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(coppc, c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c5, coppc)
  df-epi(hs0)
  tposex(c1)
  fvexi(c1, cmon, c4)
  ovtpos(c2, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(ccat)
  diff.hs0.c(ctpos(c1))
}

thm epihom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, c3, c2)))

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(chom, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cco, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cepi, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, c3, c2), w0)
  syl6bi(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c3, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c3, c2)), wral(hs2, c4, wfun(ccnv(cmpt(hs1, co(c2, c3, cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs1), co(cop(c0, c2), c6, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))))))
  isepi(hs2, hs1, cv(hs0), c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c6, c5, w0)
  simpl(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c3, c2)), wral(hs2, c4, wfun(ccnv(cmpt(hs1, co(c2, c3, cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs1), co(cop(c0, c2), c6, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, c3, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c6)
  diff.hs2.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c6)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}
